diving_thrust.name: Diving Thrust
diving_thrust.rules: After this attack card is resolved your hunter may move to adjacent node the same distance away from the monster.

dream_thrust.name: Dream Thrust
dream_thrust.rules: After this attack card is resolved your hunter may move to adjacent node the same distance away from the monster.

blizzard_thrust.name: Blizzard Thrust
blizzard_thrust.rules: After this attack card is resolved your hunter may move to adjacent node the same distance away from the monster.

frozen_dash.name: Frozen Dash
frozen_dash.rules: Move your hunter any number of nodes towards the monster before drawing damage cards. Draw +1 :damage: for each node moved.

dragon_thrust.name: Dragon Thrust
dragon_thrust.rules: After this attack card is resolved your hunter may move to adjacent node the same distance away from the monster.

dragon_guard.name: Dragon Guard
dragon_guard.rules: Draw +1 :damage: for each card on your stamina board that increases armour.

thunder_thrust.name: Thunder Thrust
thunder_thrust.rules: After this attack card is resolved your hunter may move to adjacent node the same distance away from the monster.

charged_guard.name: Charged Guard
charged_guard.rules: While this attack card is face up on your stamina board, your hunter gains +1 :armor: and +1 :fire_res::water_res::ice_res::thunder_res::dragon_res: for each :thunder: elemental attack card face up on your stamina board. At the start of your next turn, discard this card.

lunging_upthrust.name: Lunging Upthrust
lunging_upthrust.rules: Draw +1 :damage: if this is the first attack card you played this turn.

improved_lunging_upthrust.name: Improved Lunging Upthrust
improved_lunging_upthrust.rules: Draw +1 :damage: if this is the first attack card you played this turn.

charged_shell.name: Charged Shell
charged_shell.rules: This attack card can't be played if you've already played another attack card this turn.

flaming_charged_shell.name: Flaming Charged Shell
flaming_charged_shell.rules: This attack card can't be played if you've already played another attack card this turn.

lateral_thrust.name: Lateral Thrust
lateral_thrust.rules: Before this attack card is resolved your hunter may move to an adjacent node the same distance away from the monster.

blazing_lateral_thrust.name: Blazing Lateral Thrust
blazing_lateral_thrust.rules: Before this attack card is resolved your hunter may move to an adjacent node the same distance away from the monster.

burst.name: Burst
burst.rules: This attack ignores 1 monster armour. You may discard this card after placing it on your stamina board.

water_burst.name: Water Burst
water_burst.rules: This attack ignores 1 monster armour. You may discard this card after placing it on your stamina board.

dragon_burst.name: Dragon Burst
dragon_burst.rules: This attack ignores 1 monster armour. You may discard this card after placing it on your stamina board.

paralysing_burst.name: Paralysing Burst
paralysing_burst.rules: Draw +1 :damage: for each other hunter adjacent to the monster.

swarm_slash_gl.name: Swarm Slash
swarm_slash_gl.rules: After resolving this attack, another hunter may move 1 node.

overhead_slash_a.name: Overhead Slash
overhead_slash_a.rules: You may discard this attack card after placing it on your stamina board.

enhanced_overhead_slash_a.name: Enhanced Overhead Slash
enhanced_overhead_slash_a.rules: You may discard this attack card after placing it on your stamina board.

blazing_slash.name: Blazing Slash
blazing_slash.rules: You may discard this attack card after placing it on your stamina board.

double_slash_a.name: Double Slash
double_slash_a.rules: Draw +1 :damage: for each other Double Slash you played this turn.

brutal_slash.name: Brutal Slash
brutal_slash.rules: Draw +1 :damage: for each other Brutal Double Slash you played this turn.

explosive_flurry.name: Explosive Flurry
explosive_flurry.rules: You may discard this attack card after placing it on your stamina board.

dragon_rising_slash.name: Dragon Rising Slash
dragon_rising_slash.rules: If this card is placed on the fifth slot of your stamina board, place +1 :stun:

lightning_slash.name: Lightning Slash
lightning_slash.rules: Draw +1 :damage: if you've already played another :thunder: elemental attack card this turn. You may discard this attack card after placing it on your stamina board.
